content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
Hello Yi-Nuo Wang,

Let's negotiate the rental price of the apartment. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I'm interested in the apartment, but I'm looking for a fair price. I believe 800 Euro per month would be a reasonable amount. What do you think?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 800 Euro per month is too low for the kind of apartment I have to offer. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. How about 850 Euro per month? This seems like a fair price considering the location and the amenities nearby.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 850 Euro per month is still not enough for me. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, I'll increase my offer. 900 Euro per month, do you think this is more acceptable?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 900 Euro per month is still not enough for me. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. How about 950 Euro per month? This is a good deal for an unfurnished apartment in the city center.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 950 Euro per month is still not enough for me. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Very well, Mister Schmidt. My final offer is 1000 Euro per month. This is a competitive price for the location and amenities. Would you agree to this?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 1050 Euro per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
